issue.title: [C++][Doc] Rename project to make_struct in docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13368](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13368). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11206 renamed `project` to `make_struct`, but `docs/source/cpp/compute.rst` still refers to `project`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13368?focusedCommentId=17382419) by Ian Cook (icook):*
`[~bkietz]`  could you take a look to see if there might be any other places where the name remains unchanged?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13368?focusedCommentId=17382632) by Ian Cook (icook):*
It looks like `[~lidavidm]`  fixed this in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10608/> so I think we can close this as resolved after that is merged.
